title: Serhiy Datsenko (footballer, born 1987)
text:
Serhiy Datsenko (; born 6 September 1987) is a <a href="Ukraine">Ukrainian</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>.
Datsenko is a product of FC Obolon-Zmina Kyiv and FC Dynamo Kyiv Youth Sportive School systems. His first trainer was Heorhiy Navrazidi.
